name: CommandLine
description: Kaholo plugin for executing cmd/shell commands.

params.name: workingDir
params.description: The directory to execute the command from.

params.name: exitOnClose
params.description: If true wait until a 'close' event is emitted. If false waits until an 'exit' event is emitted instead.

params.name: shell
params.description: For linux specifies whether to use bin/sh or bin/bash as the shell. For windows only default cmd.exe is available.

params.name: COMMANDS
params.description: The commands to execute. To enter multiple commands seperate each with a new line.

params.name: KEY_PATH
params.description: The path of the key to use to authenticate with to remote server using SSH.

params.name: REMOTE_USER
params.description: The SSH username to use to authenticate to the remote host.

params.name: REMOTE_ADDRESS
params.description: The URL of the host to execute the command on.

params.name: port
params.description: The port used to connect with SSH to the remote host.

params.name: COMMANDS
params.description: The command to execute on the remote host.

params.name: numberOfTime
params.description: Number of times to execute the command.

params.name: workingDirectory
params.description: If specified, execute the command from the specified directory.
